folder.name: Top-level functions and methods
folder.tiptext: Flash JavaScript top-level functions and methods

folder.name: Global methods
folder.tiptext: Methods that can be called from any JavaScript API script

string.name: alert
string.tiptext: Displays a string in a modal Alert dialog box, along with an OK button

string.name: confirm
string.tiptext: Displays a string in a modal Alert dialog box, along with OK and Cancel buttons

string.name: prompt
string.tiptext: Displays a prompt in a modal Alert dialog box, along with OK and Cancel buttons

string.name: configureEffect
string.tiptext: Called once when Flash loads

string.name: executeEffect
string.tiptext: Called when the user first applies an effect or changes an effect's properties

string.name: removeEffect
string.tiptext: Called when the user changes an effect's properties or removes effect

folder.name: Extensible tools
folder.tiptext: Functions available in scripts that create extensible tools

string.name: activate
string.tiptext: Called when tool becomes active

string.name: configureTool
string.tiptext: Called when the tool is loaded at launch

string.name: deactivate
string.tiptext: Called when tool becomes inactive

string.name: keyDown
string.tiptext: When tool is active, called if key is pressed

string.name: keyUp
string.tiptext: When tool is active, called if a key is released

string.name: mouseDoubleClick
string.tiptext: When tool is active, called if mouse button double clicked

string.name: mouseDown
string.tiptext: When tool is active, called when the mouse button is pressed

string.name: mouseMove
string.tiptext: When tool is active, called if mouse moves over the Stage

string.name: mouseUp
string.tiptext: When tool is active, called if mouse button is released on the Stage

string.name: notifySettingsChanged
string.tiptext: Notifies tool if user changes options in the PI

string.name: setCursor
string.tiptext: Allows the tool to set custom cursors

string.name: getClassForObject
string.tiptext: Returns the class of a specified variable

string.name: getScriptAssistMode
string.tiptext: Specifies whether Script Assist mode is enabled

string.name: getSelectedText
string.tiptext: Returns the text that is currently selected in the Actions panel

string.name: getText
string.tiptext: Returns the text in the Actions panel

string.name: hasSelection
string.tiptext: Specifies whether any text is currently selected in the Actions panel

string.name: replaceSelectedText
string.tiptext: Replaces the currently selected text with specified text

string.name: setScriptAssistMode
string.tiptext: Enables or disables Script Assist mode

string.name: setSelection
string.tiptext: Selects a specified set of characters in the Actions panel

string.name: setText
string.tiptext: Clears any text in the Actions panel and then adds specified text

folder.name: BitmapInstance
folder.tiptext: Subclass of Instance; a bitmap on the Stage

string.name: getBits
string.tiptext: Gets bits from a bitmap

string.name: setBits
string.tiptext: Sets bits of a bitmap

string.name: hPixels
string.tiptext: Width of BItmapInstance in pixels

string.name: vPixels
string.tiptext: Height of BItmapInstance in pixels

folder.name: BitmapItem
folder.tiptext: Subclass of Item; a bitmap symbol in the Library

string.name: allowSmoothing
string.tiptext: If true, smooths edges of bitmap with anti-aliasing

string.name: compressionType
string.tiptext: Specifies compression type for export

string.name: quality
string.tiptext: Quality for JPEG compression

string.name: useImportedJPEGQuality
string.tiptext: If true, imported JPEG's quality for export

folder.name: CompiledClipInstance
folder.tiptext: Subclass of SymbolInstance; a compiled clip instance on the Stage

string.name: accName
string.tiptext: Name of an object, used by screen reader

string.name: actionScript
string.tiptext: String representing the ActionScript on an instance

string.name: description
string.tiptext: Description of the object, used by screen reader

string.name: forceSimple
string.tiptext: If true, the children of the object are not accessible to screen reader

string.name: shortcut
string.tiptext: An object's runtime shortcut key

string.name: silent
string.tiptext: If true, object is not read by screen reader

string.name: tabIndex
string.tiptext: tabIndex value of an object

string.name: clear
string.tiptext: Clears the contents of the Compiler Errors panel

string.name: save
string.tiptext: Saves the contents of the Compiler Errors panel to a local text file

folder.name: ComponentInstance
folder.tiptext: Subclass of SymbolInstance; a component instance on the Stage

string.name: parameters
string.tiptext: Component's parameters

string.name: addItemToDocument
string.tiptext: Adds component to the document

string.name: componentsPanel.reload
string.tiptext: Refreshes the Components panel's list of components

folder.name: Contour
folder.tiptext: A closed path of half edges

string.name: getHalfEdge
string.tiptext: Returns a halfEdge object

string.name: interior
string.tiptext: If true, contour encloses an area

string.name: orientation
string.tiptext: Integer indicating the orientation of a contour

string.name: addDataToDocument
string.tiptext: Stores data with a document

string.name: addDataToSelection
string.tiptext: Stores data with selected objects

string.name: addFilter
string.tiptext: Adds a filter to selected objects

string.name: addItem
string.tiptext: Adds an Item from the Library to the Stage

string.name: addNewLine
string.tiptext: Draws a line on the Stage

string.name: addNewOval
string.tiptext: Draws an oval on the Stage

string.name: addNewPublishProfile
string.tiptext: Adds a new publish profile

string.name: addNewRectangle
string.tiptext: Draws a new rectangle on the Stage

string.name: addNewScene
string.tiptext: Adds a new scene

string.name: addNewText
string.tiptext: Inserts a new empty text field

string.name: align
string.tiptext: Aligns the selection

string.name: allowScreens
string.tiptext: Checks if the Screen Outline is available

string.name: arrange
string.tiptext: Arranges the selection

string.name: breakApart
string.tiptext: Breaks apart the current selection

string.name: canEditSymbol
string.tiptext: If true, the editSymbol() method can be used

string.name: canRevert
string.tiptext: Indicates if a document can be reverted

string.name: canSaveAVersion
string.tiptext: Determines if version of the specified document can be saved in Version Cue

string.name: canTestMovie
string.tiptext: Indicates if movie can be tested

string.name: canTestScene
string.tiptext: Indicates if current scene can be tested

string.name: changeFilterOrder
string.tiptext: Moves the filter at oldIndex to newIndex

string.name: clipCopy
string.tiptext: Copies the selection selection to the Clipboard

string.name: clipCut
string.tiptext: Cuts the selection to the Clipboard

string.name: clipPaste
string.tiptext: Pastes the Clipboard into the document

string.name: close
string.tiptext: Closes the current document

string.name: convertLinesToFills
string.tiptext: Converts lines to fills on selected objects

string.name: convertToSymbol
string.tiptext: Converts selected items to a new symbol

string.name: crop
string.tiptext: Crops the currently selected Drawing objects

string.name: deletePublishProfile
string.tiptext: Deletes the current publish profile

string.name: deleteEnvelope
string.tiptext: Deletes the envelope (bounding box) from the selected objects

string.name: deleteScene
string.tiptext: Deletes the current scene

string.name: deleteSelection
string.tiptext: Deletes the selection from the Stage

string.name: disableAllFilters
string.tiptext: Disables all filters of selected objects

string.name: disableFilter
string.tiptext: Disables the filter at the index

string.name: disableOtherFilters
string.tiptext: Disables all filters except the filter at index

string.name: distribute
string.tiptext: Distributes the selection

string.name: distributeToLayers
string.tiptext: Distributes the current selection to layers

string.name: documentHasData
string.tiptext: If true, there is persistent data

string.name: duplicatePublishProfile
string.tiptext: Duplicates the current profile

string.name: duplicateScene
string.tiptext: Duplicates the current scene

string.name: duplicateSelection
string.tiptext: Duplicates the selection

string.name: editScene
string.tiptext: Sets the specified scene to be the current one

string.name: enableAllFilters
string.tiptext: Enables all filters of selected objects

string.name: enableFilter
string.tiptext: Enables the filter at the index

string.name: enterEditMode
string.tiptext: Enters an edit mode for a symbol or group

string.name: exitEditMode
string.tiptext: Exits an edit mode

string.name: exportPublishProfile
string.tiptext: Exports the current publish profile to file

string.name: exportPNG
string.tiptext: Exports the document as one or more PNG files

string.name: exportSWF
string.tiptext: Exports document as a SWF

string.name: getAlignToDocument
string.tiptext: Returns the value of the Align to Stage setting

string.name: getBlendMode
string.tiptext: Returns the blend mode of selected objects

string.name: getCustomFill
string.tiptext: Returns the Fill object of selection or Tools panel

string.name: getCustomStroke
string.tiptext: Returns the Stroke object or Tools panel setting

string.name: getDataFromDocument
string.tiptext: Returns the value of the named data

string.name: getElementProperty
string.tiptext: Returns the specified Element property

string.name: getElementTextAttr
string.tiptext: Returns the specified TextAttrs property

string.name: getFilters
string.tiptext: Returns the array of filters of selected objects

string.name: getMetadata
string.tiptext: Returns the XML metadata

string.name: getMobileSettings
string.tiptext: Returns the string passed to document.setMobileSettings()

string.name: getPlayerVersion
string.tiptext: Returns a string that represents the targeted Player version for the specified document

string.name: getSelectionRect
string.tiptext: Returns the bounding rectangle of the selection

string.name: getTextString
string.tiptext: Returns the text string of the selected text

string.name: getTimeline
string.tiptext: Returns the current timeline

string.name: getTransformationPoint
string.tiptext: Returns the location of the transformation point

string.name: group
string.tiptext: Converts the selection to a group

string.name: importFile
string.tiptext: Imports a file into the document or library

string.name: importPublishProfile
string.tiptext: Imports a publish profile from file

string.name: importSWF
string.tiptext: Imports a SWF into the document

string.name: intersect
string.tiptext: Creates an intersection Drawing object from all selected Drawing objects

string.name: match
string.tiptext: Makes the size of selected objects equal

string.name: mouseClick
string.tiptext: Performs a mouse click

string.name: mouseDblClk
string.tiptext: Performs a mouse double click

string.name: moveSelectedBezierPointsBy
string.tiptext: Moves the selected Bezier points

string.name: moveSelectionBy
string.tiptext: Moves the selection

string.name: optimizeCurves
string.tiptext: Opimizes the curves of the selected shape

string.name: publish
string.tiptext: Publishes a document

string.name: punch
string.tiptext: Punches through all selected Drawing objects

string.name: removeDataFromDocument
string.tiptext: Removes persistent data from document

string.name: removeDataFromSelection
string.tiptext: Removes persistent data from selected objects

string.name: removeAllFilters
string.tiptext: Removes all filters from selected objects

string.name: removeFilter
string.tiptext: Removes the filter at the index

string.name: renamePublishProfile
string.tiptext: Renames the current publish profile

string.name: renameScene
string.tiptext: Renames the selected scene

string.name: reorderScene
string.tiptext: Reorders specified scene

string.name: resetOvalObject
string.tiptext: Sets all values in the Property Inspector to default oval object settings

string.name: resetRectangleObject
string.tiptext: Sets all values in the Property Inspector to default rectangle object settings

string.name: resetTransformation
string.tiptext: Resets the transformation matrix

string.name: revert
string.tiptext: Reverts the specified document

string.name: revertDocumentToLastVersion
string.tiptext: Reverts the specified document to the previous version stored on the Version Cue server

string.name: rotateSelection
string.tiptext: Rotates a selection

string.name: save
string.tiptext: Saves document

string.name: saveAndCompact
string.tiptext: Saves and compacts document

string.name: saveAVersion
string.tiptext: Displays comments dialog, saves version of document in Version Cue

string.name: scaleSelection
string.tiptext: Scales a selection

string.name: selectAll
string.tiptext: Selects all items on the Stage

string.name: selectNone
string.tiptext: Deselects all items on the Stage

string.name: setAlignToDocument
string.tiptext: If true, objects are aligned, distributed, sized, or spaced to the Stage

string.name: setBlendMode
string.tiptext: Sets the blend mode of selected objects

string.name: setCustomFill
string.tiptext: Sets the current fill settings of selection or Tools panel

string.name: setCustomStroke
string.tiptext: Sets the current stroke settings of selection or Tools panel

string.name: setElementProperty
string.tiptext: Sets the specified property of an Element object

string.name: setElementTextAttr
string.tiptext: Sets the specified property of the selected text items

string.name: setFillColor
string.tiptext: Changes the fill color of a selection

string.name: setFilterProperty
string.tiptext: Sets the specified filter property of selected objects

string.name: setFilters
string.tiptext: Sets the array of filters to selected objects

string.name: setInstanceAlpha
string.tiptext: Sets the opacity of an instance

string.name: setInstanceBrightness
string.tiptext: Sets the brightness of an instance

string.name: setInstanceTint
string.tiptext: Sets the tint of an instance

string.name: setMetadata
string.tiptext: Sets the XML metadata, returns false if set failed

string.name: setMobileSettings
string.tiptext: Sets the value of an XML settings string in a mobile FLA file

string.name: setOvalObjectProperty
string.tiptext: Specifies a value for a specified property of primitive oval objects

string.name: setPlayerVersion
string.tiptext: Sets the version of the Flash Player targeted by the specified document

string.name: setRectangleObjectProperty
string.tiptext: Specifies a value for a specified property of primitive rectangle objects

string.name: setSelectionBounds
string.tiptext: Moves and resizes a selection

string.name: setSelectionRect
string.tiptext: Sets the selection rectangle

string.name: setStroke
string.tiptext: Sets stroke properties of selected stroke

string.name: setStrokeColor
string.tiptext: Changes the stroke color of selected stroke

string.name: setStrokeSize
string.tiptext: Changes the stroke width of selected stroke

string.name: setStrokeStyle
string.tiptext: Changes the stroke style of selected stroke

string.name: setTextRectangle
string.tiptext: Changes the bounding rectangle for the selected text item

string.name: setTextSelection
string.tiptext: Sets the text selection of the selected text field

string.name: setTextString
string.tiptext: Adds specifed text string to selected text field

string.name: setTransformationPoint
string.tiptext: Moves the transformation point of selection

string.name: skewSelection
string.tiptext: Skews the selection

string.name: smoothSelection
string.tiptext: Smoothes the selected curve of a shape

string.name: space
string.tiptext: Spaces the objects of a selection evenly

string.name: straightenSelection
string.tiptext: Straightens the selected curve of a shape

string.name: swapElement
string.tiptext: Swaps selected symbol with specifed one

string.name: swapStrokeAndFill
string.tiptext: Swaps the Stroke and Fill colors

string.name: synchronizeWithHeadVersion
string.tiptext: Synchronizes document with current version in Version Cue

string.name: testMovie
string.tiptext: Test Movie

string.name: testScene
string.tiptext: Test Current Scene

string.name: traceBitmap
string.tiptext: Traces a bitmap

string.name: transformSelection
string.tiptext: Performs a general transformation

string.name: unGroup
string.tiptext: Ungroups the selected group

string.name: union
string.tiptext: Combines all selected shapes into a Drawing object

string.name: unlockAllElements
string.tiptext: Unlocks all symbols on the current frame

string.name: xmlPanel
string.tiptext: Displays the specified XMLUI dialog box

string.name: accName
string.tiptext: Name of movie, used by screen reader

string.name: as3AutoDeclare
string.tiptext: Whether instances placed on Stage are automatically declared in user-defined timeline classes

string.name: as3Dialect
string.tiptext: A string that describes the ActionScript 3.0 'dialect' being used in the specified document

string.name: as3ExportFrame
string.tiptext: Index of frame to export as AS 3.0

string.name: as3StrictMode
string.tiptext: Enable strict mode option for AS 3.0 compiler

string.name: as3WarningsMode
string.tiptext: Enable warnings mode option for AS 3.0 compiler

string.name: asVersion
string.tiptext: An integer that specifies which version of ActionScript is being used in the specified file

string.name: autoLabel
string.tiptext: If true, turns on automatic labeling for screen reader

string.name: backgroundColor
string.tiptext: A color representing the background

string.name: currentPublishProfile
string.tiptext: Sets and returns the name of the active publish profile

string.name: currentTimeline
string.tiptext: Represents the active timeline

string.name: description
string.tiptext: Description of the main movie, used by screen reader

string.name: docClass
string.tiptext: Specifies the top-level ActionScript 3.0 class associated with the document

string.name: forceSimple
string.tiptext: If true, the children of the object are not accessible to screen reader

string.name: frameRate
string.tiptext: Document's frames per second

string.name: height
string.tiptext: Height of the document

string.name: id
string.tiptext: A unique integer (assigned automatically) that identifies a document during a Flash session

string.name: library
string.tiptext: Represents the document's Library

string.name: livePreview
string.tiptext: If true, visually displays components at authortime

string.name: name
string.tiptext: Name of the document

string.name: path
string.tiptext: The file path of the document

string.name: publishProfiles
string.tiptext: An array containing the publish profiles for document

string.name: screenOutline
string.tiptext: The current ScreenOutline object for the document

string.name: selection
string.tiptext: An array of selected Element objects

string.name: silent
string.tiptext: If true, movie is not read by screen reader

string.name: timelines
string.tiptext: An array containing the Timeline objects of the document

string.name: viewMatrix
string.tiptext: References the TransformationMatrix object

string.name: width
string.tiptext: Width of the document

string.name: zoomFactor
string.tiptext: Specifies the zoom percent of the Stage at author time

folder.name: DrawingLayer
folder.tiptext: Used by tools for temporary drawing while dragging the mouse

string.name: beginDraw
string.tiptext: Puts Flash into drawing mode

string.name: beginFrame
string.tiptext: Starting point to delimit a set of lines

string.name: cubicCurveTo
string.text: .cubicCurveTo(% x1Ctrl, y1Ctrl, x2Ctl, y2Ctl, xEnd, yEnd %)
string.tiptext: Draws a cubic curve

string.name: curveTo
string.tiptext: Draws a quadratic curve segment

string.name: drawPath
string.tiptext: Draws the specified path

string.name: endDraw
string.tiptext: Exits drawing mode

string.name: endFrame
string.tiptext: Erases the paths drawn by DrawingLayer object

string.name: lineTo
string.tiptext: Draws a line

string.name: moveTo
string.tiptext: Sets the current drawing position

string.name: newPath
string.tiptext: Returns a new path object

string.name: setColor
string.tiptext: Sets the color of subsequently drawn data

folder.name: Edge
folder.tiptext: Represents an edge of an object on the Stage

string.name: getControl
string.tiptext: Returns the control point of the specified Edge object

string.name: getHalfEdge
string.tiptext: Returns a HalfEdge object

string.name: setControl
string.tiptext: Sets the control point of an edge

string.name: splitEdge
string.tiptext: Divides specified Edge object into two

string.name: id
string.tiptext: An unique identifier for the Edge object

string.name: isLine
string.tiptext: If true, Edge is a straight line

string.name: effectName
string.tiptext: Name of an effect, used to create menu item

string.name: groupName
string.tiptext: Name of an effect group, used to create the menu item

string.name: sourceFile
string.tiptext: Name of JSFL source file

string.name: symbolType
string.tiptext: Name of symbolType to create during initial application of the effect

string.name: useXMLToUI
string.tiptext: If true, displays a XMLUI dialog box

folder.name: Element
folder.tiptext: Represents all objects on the Stage

string.name: getPersistentData
string.tiptext: Returns the value of the named data

string.name: getTransformationPoint
string.tiptext: Gets the value of the specified element's transformation point

string.name: hasPersistentData
string.tiptext: If true, data with specified name is attached to object

string.name: removePersistentData
string.tiptext: Removes persistent data attached to object

string.name: setPersistentData
string.tiptext: Stores specified data with an object

string.name: setTransformationPoint
string.tiptext: Sets the position of the element's transformation point

string.name: depth
string.tiptext: Returns the drawing order of the selected element

string.name: elementType
string.tiptext: Type of Element object

string.name: height
string.tiptext: Height of the Element

string.name: layer
string.tiptext: Represents the Layer object on which the element is located

string.name: left
string.tiptext: Left side of Element

string.name: locked
string.tiptext: If true, the Element is locked

string.name: matrix
string.tiptext: References the TransformationMatrix object

string.name: name
string.tiptext: Instance Name of Element

string.name: rotation
string.tiptext: The rotation of an element in clockwise degrees

string.name: selected
string.tiptext: Specifies whether the element is selected or not

string.name: scaleX
string.tiptext: The x value of an element's scale

string.name: scaleY
string.tiptext: The y value of an element's scale

string.name: skewX
string.tiptext: The x value of an element's skew

string.name: skewY
string.tiptext: The y value of an element's skew

string.name: top
string.tiptext: Top side of Element

string.name: transformX
string.tiptext: The x value of an element's transformation point

string.name: transformY
string.tiptext: The y value of an element's transformation point

string.name: width
string.tiptext: Width of the Element

string.name: x
string.tiptext: The x value of an element's registration point

string.name: y
string.tiptext: The y value of an element's registration point

folder.name: Fill
folder.tiptext: Fill settings for the selection or Tools panel

string.name: color
string.tiptext: The fill color

string.name: colorArray
string.tiptext: An array of colors in a gradient

string.name: focalPoint
string.tiptext: Specifies the gradient focal point horizontal offset from the transformation point

string.name: linearRGB
string.tiptext: Specifies whether to render the fill as a linear or radial RGB gradient

string.name: matrix
string.tiptext: Defines the placement, orientation, and scales for gradient fills

string.name: overflow
string.tiptext: Specifies the behavior of a gradient's overflow

string.name: posArray
string.tiptext: Indicates the position of the corresponding color in a gradient

string.name: style
string.tiptext: The fill style

folder.name: Filter
folder.tiptext: Contains all the properties for all filters

string.name: angle
string.tiptext: Angle of the filter, in degrees

string.name: blurX
string.tiptext: Amount to blur in the x direction, in pixels

string.name: blurY
string.tiptext: Amount to blur in the y direction, in pixels

string.name: brightness
string.tiptext: Brightness of the filter, from -100 to 100

string.name: color
string.tiptext: Color of the filter

string.name: contrast
string.tiptext: Contrast value of the filter, from -100 to 100

string.name: distance
string.tiptext: How far the filter extends from an object, from 0 to 255 pixels

string.name: enabled
string.tiptext: A Boolean value that specifies whether the specified filter is enabled

string.name: hideObject
string.tiptext: Specfies whether the source image is hidden or displayed

string.name: highlightColor
string.tiptext: Color of the highlight

string.name: hue
string.tiptext: Hue of the filter, between -180 and 180

string.name: inner
string.tiptext: Specfies whether the shadow is an inner shadow

string.name: knockout
string.tiptext: Specifies whether the filter is a knockout filter

string.name: name
string.tiptext: Type of filter

string.name: quality
string.tiptext: Blur quality

string.name: saturation
string.tiptext: Saturation value of the filter, from -100 to 100

string.name: shadowColor
string.tiptext: Color of the shadow

string.name: strength
string.tiptext: Percentage strength of the filter, between 0 and 25,500

string.name: type
string.tiptext: Type of bevel or glow filter

string.name: addEventListener
string.tiptext: Registers a function to be called when a specific event is received

string.name: browseForFolderURL
string.tiptext: Returns the URL of the folder

string.name: browseForFileURL
string.tiptext: Brings up an Open or Save dialog box

string.name: closeAll
string.tiptext: Closes all open documents

string.name: closeAllPlayerDocuments
string.tiptext: Closes all the movie windows (SWF, not FLA files) that are currently open

string.name: closeDocument
string.tiptext: Closes the specified document

string.name: closeProject
string.tiptext: Closes the Project (FLP) file that is currently open

string.name: copyClipString
string.tiptext: Copies the specified string to the Clipboard

string.name: createDocument
string.tiptext: Opens a new document

string.name: createProject
string.tiptext: Creates a Project (FLP) file

string.name: downloadLatestVersion
string.tiptext: Retrieves the latest version of a file that is not currently open from Version Cue

string.name: enableImmediateUpdates
string.tiptext: Specifies whether to update the timeline display when executing an effect. Only used for debugging effect.

string.name: fileExists
string.tiptext: Returns true if specified file exists

string.name: findDocumentDOM
string.tiptext: Lets you target a specific file by using its unique identifier

string.name: findDocumentIndex
string.tiptext: Returns the specified Document object's index

string.name: findObjectInDocByName
string.tiptext: Returns array of elements that match the instance name provided

string.name: findObjectInDocByType
string.tiptext: Returns array of elements that match the instance type provided

string.name: getAppMemoryInfo
string.tiptext: (Windows only); returns number of bytes used in an area of Flash.exe memory

string.name: getDocumentDOM
string.tiptext: Returns the active Document object

string.name: getPrefInteger
string.tiptext: Returns the value of a preference set by fl.setPrefInteger()

string.name: getPrefString
string.tiptext: Returns the value of a preference set by fl.setPrefString()

string.name: getProject
string.tiptext: Returns a Project object that represents the currently open project

string.name: openDocument
string.tiptext: Opens specified FLA file

string.name: quit
string.tiptext: Quits Flash

string.name: reloadEffects
string.tiptext: Reloads all effects descriptors

string.name: reloadTools
string.tiptext: Rebuilds the Tools panel

string.name: removeEventListener
string.tiptext: Unregisters a function that was registered using fl.addEventListener()

string.name: resetAS3PackagePaths
string.tiptext: Resets the global package paths for AS 3.0 to default settings

string.name: resetPackagePaths
string.tiptext: Resets the global package paths for AS 2.0 to default settings

string.name: revertDocument
string.tiptext: Reverts specified document

string.name: revertDocumentToLastVersion
string.tiptext: Reverts the specified document to the version on the Version Cue server

string.name: runScript
string.tiptext: Executes a JavaScript file

string.name: saveAll
string.tiptext: Saves all open documents

string.name: saveAVersionOfDocument
string.tiptext: Saves the specified document to a version on the Version Cue server

string.name: saveDocument
string.tiptext: Saves specified document

string.name: saveDocumentAs
string.tiptext: Displays the Save As dialog

string.name: selectElement
string.tiptext: Selects the element passed in

string.name: selectTool
string.tiptext: Selects the specified tool in the toolbar

string.name: setActiveWindow
string.tiptext: Sets the active window to be the specified document

string.name: setPrefInteger
string.tiptext: Specifies an integer value to be assigned to a particular preference category

string.name: setPrefString
string.tiptext: Specifies a string value to be assigned to a particular preference category

string.name: showIdleMessage
string.tiptext: Lets you disable the warning about a script running too long

string.name: synchronizeDocumentWithHeadVersion
string.tiptext: Synchronizes the specified document with the most current version from Version Cue

string.name: trace
string.tiptext: Sends a test string to the Output panel

string.name: actionsPanel
string.tiptext: Reference to Actions panel object

string.name: as3PackagePaths
string.tiptext: The global package path setting for AS 3.0

string.name: compilerErrors
string.tiptext: A compilerErrors object, which represents the Errors panel

string.name: contactSensitiveSelection
string.tiptext: Specifies whether Contact sensitive selection mode is enabled

string.name: activeEffect
string.tiptext: The effect descriptor

string.name: componentsPanel
string.tiptext: Reference to the Components panel

string.name: configDirectory
string.tiptext: Contains the full path name for local user's Configuration directory

string.name: configURI
string.tiptext: Returns the URI to the local user's config directory

string.name: documents
string.tiptext: An array of Document objects

string.name: effects
string.tiptext: An array of effect descriptors

string.name: Math
string.tiptext: Reference to a Math object

string.name: objectDrawingMode
string.tiptext: Specifies whether the object drawing mode is enabled

string.name: outputPanel
string.tiptext: Reference to Output panel object

string.name: packagePaths
string.tiptext: The global package path setting for AS 2.0

string.name: scriptURI
string.tiptext: file:/// URI string that represents the path of the currently running JSFL script

string.name: tools
string.tiptext: An array of ToolsObj objects

string.name: version
string.tiptext: Returns the Flash authoring tool's version

string.name: xmlui
string.tiptext: References a XMLUI dialog box

folder.name: FLfile object
folder.tiptext: Lets you write Flash extensions that can access the local file system

string.name: copy
string.tiptext: Copies fileURI to copyURI

string.name: createFolder
string.tiptext: Creates a folder at the folderURI location

string.name: exists
string.tiptext: Determines whether a file exists

string.name: getAttributes
string.tiptext: Returns a string representing the attributes of fileOrFolderURI

string.name: getCreationDate
string.tiptext: Gets the time when the file was created

string.name: getCreationDateObj
string.tiptext: Returns a JavaScript Date object that represents when the file was created

string.name: getModificationDate
string.tiptext: Gets the time when the file was last modified

string.name: getModificationDateObj
string.tiptext: Returns a JavaScript Date object that represents when the file was modified

string.name: getSize
string.tiptext: Returns the size of the file, in bytes

string.name: listFolder
string.tiptext: Returns an array of strings representing the contents of the folder

string.name: read
string.tiptext: Returns the contents of the file as a string

string.name: remove
string.tiptext: Deletes the file or folder

string.name: setAttributes
string.tiptext: Specifies system-level attributes for the file

string.name: write
string.tiptext: Writes a string to the file (as UTF-8)

folder.name: FolderItem
folder.tiptext: Subclass of Item; a folder in the Library

folder.name: Refer to Item object for properties or methods
folder.tiptext: Refer to Item object for properties or methods

folder.name: FontItem
folder.tiptext: Subclass of Item; a font symbol in the Library

folder.name: Refer to Item object for properties or methods
folder.tiptext: Refer to Item object for properties or methods

string.name: getCustomEase
string.tiptext: Returns an array of control points that define the ease curve

string.name: setCustomEase
string.tiptext: Specifies an array of coordinates that describe a custom ease curve

string.name: actionScript
string.tiptext: String containing the ActionScript on a frame

string.name: duration
string.tiptext: Number of frames in a frame span

string.name: elements
string.tiptext: An array of Element objects

string.name: hasCustomEase
string.tiptext: Specifies whether the frame gets ease information from custom ease curve

string.name: labelType
string.tiptext: This specifies the type of frame label

string.name: motionTweenOrientToPath
string.tiptext: If true, object tweens oriented to path

string.name: motionTweenRotate
string.tiptext: Specifies if the object rotates during tween

string.name: motionTweenRotateTimes
string.tiptext: Number of rotations

string.name: motionTweenScale
string.tiptext: If true, object scales while tweening

string.name: motionTweenSnap
string.tiptext: If true, object snaps to motion guide

string.name: motionTweenSync
string.tiptext: If true, tween synchronizes symbols

string.name: name
string.tiptext: Label of the frame

string.name: shapeTweenBlend
string.tiptext: Specifieds the blend setting for a shape tween

string.name: soundEffect
string.tiptext: The effects on the sound

string.name: soundLibraryItem
string.tiptext: Library item used to instantiate a sound

string.name: soundLoop
string.tiptext: Specifies the number of times a sound loops

string.name: soundLoopMode
string.tiptext: Specifies whether sound should loop or repeat indefinitely

string.name: soundName
string.tiptext: Name of sound

string.name: soundSync
string.tiptext: Specifies the sync behavior of a sound

string.name: startFrame
string.tiptext: The frame number of the first frame in a span

string.name: tweenEasing
string.tiptext: The amount of easing

string.name: tweenType
string.tiptext: The type of tween

string.name: useSingleEaseCurve
string.tiptext: Specifies whether one custom ease curve is used for all properties

folder.name: HalfEdge
folder.tiptext: Half of an edge of a contour

string.name: getEdge
string.tiptext: Returns the Edge object that contains the HalfEdge

string.name: getNext
string.tiptext: Returns the next HalfEdge

string.name: getOppositeHalfEdge
string.tiptext: Returns the oposite HalfEdge object

string.name: getPrev
string.tiptext: Returns the preceding HalfEdge

string.name: getVertex
string.tiptext: Returns the vertex of the HalfEdge

string.name: id
string.tiptext: An unique identifier for the HalfEdge

string.name: index
string.tiptext: The index of the HalfEdge in the parent Edge

folder.name: Instance
folder.tiptext: Subclass of Element; an instance on the Stage

string.name: instanceType
string.tiptext: Type of Instance

string.name: libraryItem
string.tiptext: Library item used to instantiate Instance

string.name: addData
string.tiptext: Adds data to the Library item

string.name: getData
string.tiptext: Returns the value of the named data

string.name: hasData
string.tiptext: If true, the Library item has the named data

string.name: removeData
string.tiptext: Removes data from the Library item

string.name: itemType
string.tiptext: The symbol type of the Item

string.name: linkageBaseClass
string.tiptext: A string that specifies the ActionScript 3.0 class that will be associated with the symbol

string.name: linkageClassName
string.tiptext: Specifies an ActionScript 2 class to associate with symbol

string.name: linkageExportForAS
string.tiptext: If true, the Item will be exported for ActionScript

string.name: linkageExportForRS
string.tiptext: If true, the Item will be exported for runtime sharing

string.name: linkageExportInFirstFrame
string.tiptext: If true, the Item will be exported in the first frame

string.name: linkageIdentifier
string.tiptext: The name of the symbol when referenced by ActionScript or runtime sharing

string.name: linkageImportForRS
string.tiptext: If true, the Item will be imported for runtime sharing

string.name: linkageURL
string.tiptext: Location of the shared asset SWF

string.name: name
string.tiptext: Name of the Library item

string.name: color
string.tiptext: The color used to outline objects on the layer

string.name: frameCount
string.tiptext: Total number of frames in the Layer

string.name: frames
string.tiptext: An array of Frame objects

string.name: height
string.tiptext: Height of the Layer

string.name: layerType
string.tiptext: Specifies the Layer type

string.name: locked
string.tiptext: If true, Layer is locked

string.name: name
string.tiptext: Name of the Layer

string.name: outline
string.tiptext: If TRUE, Layer is displayed as outlines

string.name: parentLayer
string.tiptext: Defines the Layers's parent Layer

string.name: visible
string.tiptext: If true, Layer is visible

string.name: addItemToDocument
string.tiptext: Adds an Item from the Library to the document

string.name: addNewItem
string.tiptext: Creates a new Item

string.name: deleteItem
string.tiptext: Deletes an Item

string.name: duplicateItem
string.tiptext: Makes a copy of the currently selected Item

string.name: editItem
string.tiptext: Returns true if the specified Item is editable

string.name: expandFolder
string.tiptext: If true, expands folder; if false collapses it

string.name: findItemIndex
string.tiptext: Returns an object containing the index of the Item

string.name: getItemProperty
string.tiptext: Returns specified property for a selected Item

string.name: getItemType
string.tiptext: Returns the type of the specified Item

string.name: getSelectedItems
string.tiptext: Returns an array containing the selected Items

string.name: importEmbeddedSWF
string.tiptext: Imports a contained SWF to the Library

string.name: itemExists
string.tiptext: Returns true if the specified Item exists

string.name: moveToFolder
string.tiptext: Moves Item into a folder

string.name: newFolder
string.tiptext: Creates a new Folder

string.name: renameItem
string.tiptext: Renames selected Item

string.name: selectAll
string.tiptext: Selects all Items

string.name: selectItem
string.tiptext: Selects specified Item

string.name: selectNone
string.tiptext: Deselects all Items

string.name: setItemProperty
string.tiptext: Sets specified property for the currently selected Items

string.name: updateItem
string.tiptext: Updates specified Item

string.name: items
string.tiptext: An array containing all Item objects in the Library

folder.name: Math
folder.tiptext: Used to do common mathematical operations

string.name: concatMatrix
string.tiptext: Performs concatenates the specified Matrix objects

string.name: invertMatrix
string.tiptext: Returns the inverse of specified Matrix

string.name: pointDistance
string.tiptext: Computes the distance between specified points

string.name: a
string.tiptext: The scale factor to the x axis

string.name: b
string.tiptext: Skews object by moving right edge along vertical axis

string.name: c
string.tiptext: Skews object by moving bottom edge along horizontal axis

string.name: d
string.tiptext: The scale factor to the y axis

string.name: tx
string.tiptext: The location of the object along the x axis

string.name: ty
string.tiptext: The location of the object along the y axis

string.name: clear
string.tiptext: Clears contents from the panel

string.name: save
string.tiptext: Saves the contents of the Output Panel to a file

string.name: trace
string.tiptext: Sends a test string to the Output panel

folder.name: Oval
folder.tiptext: A shape that is drawn using the Oval tool

string.name: closePath
string.tiptext: Flag indicating whether the Close Path checkbox in the Property Inspector is selected

string.name: endAngle
string.tiptext: A float value that specfies the start angle of the oval object

string.name: innerRadius
string.tiptext: A float value that specfies the inner radius of the oval object as a percentage

string.name: startAngle
string.tiptext: A float value that specfies the end angle of the oval object

folder.name: Parameter
folder.tiptext: Parameters for a Screen or Component

string.name: insertItem
string.tiptext: Inserts Parameter into a list, object, or array

string.name: removeItem
string.tiptext: Deletes Parameter from a list, object, or array

string.name: category
string.tiptext: Groups items in the Components panel, or organizes Screens

string.name: listIndex
string.tiptext: The value of the specified item; for type list only

string.name: name
string.tiptext: The name of Parameter

string.name: value
string.tiptext: The value of the property

string.name: valueType
string.tiptext: The property's value type

string.name: verbose
string.tiptext: Specifies if Parameter appears in Properties Inspector

folder.name: Path
folder.tiptext: Contains a defined sequence of line segments

string.name: addCubicCurve
string.text: .addCubicCurve(% xAnchor, yAnchor, x2, y2, x3, y3, x4, y4 %)
string.tiptext: Appends a cubic Bezier curve segment to Path

string.name: addCurve
string.text: .addCurve(% xAnchor, yAnchor, x2, y2, x3, y3 %)
string.tiptext: Appends a quadratic Bezier segment to Path

string.name: addPoint
string.tiptext: Adds a point to the Path

string.name: clear
string.tiptext: Removes all points from the Path

string.name: close
string.tiptext: Appends a point at the location of the first point of the Path

string.name: makeShape
string.tiptext: Creates a shape

string.name: newContour
string.tiptext: Starts a new Contour in the Path

string.name: nPts
string.tiptext: Returns integer representing the number of points in the Path

string.name: addFile
string.tiptext: Adds a file to the project

string.name: canPublishProject
string.tiptext: Determines whether the project can be published

string.name: canTestProject
string.tiptext: Determines whether the project can be tested

string.name: findProjectItem
string.tiptext: Searches for a file in the project

string.name: publishProject
string.tiptext: Publishes the FLA files in a project

string.name: testProject
string.tiptext: Tests the project

string.name: defaultItem
string.tiptext: ProjectItem object that represents the default document in the project

string.name: items
string.tiptext: Read-only array of ProjectItem objects in the project

string.name: name
string.tiptext: Name that appears in the Project panel

string.name: projectURI
string.tiptext: Path and name of the project file

folder.name: ProjectItem object
folder.tiptext: An item (file on disk) that has been added to a project

string.name: canPublish
string.tiptext: Determines whether an item can be published

string.name: canTest
string.tiptext: Determines whether an item can be tested

string.name: publish
string.tiptext: Publishes a project item

string.name: test
string.tiptext: Tests a project item

string.name: displayName
string.tiptext: Read-only name of a project item

string.name: isMissing
string.tiptext: Read-only Boolean value that specifies whether a file is missing from the disk

string.name: itemURI
string.tiptext: Read-only path and name of the project item

string.name: publishProfile
string.tiptext: Publish profile to use when publishing a project item (FLA file)

folder.name: Rectangle
folder.tiptext: A shape that is drawn using the Rectangle tool

string.name: bottomLeftRadius
string.tiptext: A float value that sets the radius of the bottom left corner of the rectangle object

string.name: bottomRightRadius
string.tiptext: A float value that sets the radius of the bottom right corner of the rectangle object

string.name: lockFlag
string.tiptext: A flag to determine if different corners of the rectangle can have different radius values

string.name: topLeftRadius
string.tiptext: A float value that sets the radius of all corners of the rectangle

string.name: topRightRadius
string.tiptext: A float value that sets the radius of the top right corner of the rectangle object

string.name: accName
string.tiptext: Name of an object, used by screen reader

string.name: childScreens
string.tiptext: An array of child Screens

string.name: description
string.tiptext: Description of the object, used by screen reader

string.name: forceSimple
string.tiptext: If true, the children of the object are not accessible to screen reader

string.name: hidden
string.tiptext: If true, Screen is not visible by any other Screens

string.name: instanceName
string.tiptext: The Screen's instance name

string.name: name
string.tiptext: The name of the Screen

string.name: nextScreen
string.tiptext: The next sibling in a childScreen array

string.name: parameters
string.tiptext: The properties in the Screen's Property Inspector

string.name: parentScreen
string.tiptext: A Screen which has childScreens

string.name: prevScreen
string.tiptext: The previous sibling in a childScreen array

string.name: silent
string.tiptext: If true, object is not read by screen reader

string.name: tabIndex
string.tiptext: tabIndex value of an object

string.name: timeline
string.tiptext: The Timeline object for a Screen

string.name: copyScreenFromFile
string.tiptext: Inserts all Screens from specified URI

string.name: deleteScreen
string.tiptext: Deletes a Screen

string.name: duplicateScreen
string.tiptext: Duplicates a Screen

string.name: getSelectedScreens
string.tiptext: Returns an array of selected Screens

string.name: insertNestedScreen
string.tiptext: Inserts a child screen

string.tiptext: Adds a new Screen

string.name: moveScreen
string.tiptext: Relocates a Screen

string.name: renameScreen
string.tiptext: Changes Screen's name

string.name: setCurrentScreen
string.tiptext: Sets current screen

string.name: setScreenProperty
string.tiptext: Sets specified property's value

string.name: setSelectedScreens
string.tiptext: Selects one or more Screens

string.name: currentScreen
string.tiptext: The focused Screen in the Screen Outline pane and on the Stage

string.name: screens
string.tiptext: An array of Screens

folder.tiptext: Subclass of Element; represents a shape on the Stage

string.name: beginEdit
string.tiptext: Defines the start of an edit session

string.tiptext: Deletes the specified Edge

string.name: endEdit
string.tiptext: Defines the end of an edit session

string.tiptext: If true, selected element is a Drawing object

string.tiptext: If true, selected element is a group

string.tiptext: If true, the shape is a primitive oval object (was created using the Oval tool)

string.name: isRectangleObject
string.tiptext: If true, the shape is a primitive rectangle object (was created using the Rectangle tool)

string.name: vertices

folder.tiptext: Subclass of Item; a sound in the Library

string.name: bitRate
string.tiptext: MP3 compression bitrate

string.name: bits
string.tiptext: Type of ADPCM compression

string.name: compressionType
string.tiptext: Type of compression

string.name: convertStereoToMono
string.tiptext: If true, converts a stereo sound to mono

string.name: quality
string.tiptext: MP3 compression quality setting

string.name: sampleRate
string.tiptext: The sample rate

string.name: useImportedMP3Quality
string.tiptext: If true, the imported MP3 quality is used

folder.name: Stroke
folder.tiptext: Stroke settings for the selection or the Tools panel

string.name: breakAtCorners
string.tiptext: If true, enables the Sharp Corners setting in Custom Stroke dialog

string.name: capType
string.tiptext: Type of cap for the stroke

string.name: color
string.tiptext: Stroke color

string.name: curve
string.tiptext: Specifies the curved setting; hatch line only

string.name: dash1
string.tiptext: Length of solid part of dash

string.name: dash2
string.tiptext: Length of space between dashes

string.name: density
string.tiptext: Density of stippled line

string.name: dotSize
string.tiptext: Dot size of stippled line

string.name: dotspace
string.tiptext: Spacing between dots of dotted line

string.name: hatchThickness
string.tiptext: Thickness of hatches in hatched line

string.tiptext: Jiggle style of hatched line

string.name: joinType
string.tiptext: Type of join for the stroke

string.name: length
string.tiptext: Length of hatches in hatched line

string.name: miterLimit
string.tiptext: Angle above which the tip of the miter will be truncated by a segment

string.name: pattern
string.tiptext: Pattern of ragged line

string.name: rotate
string.tiptext: Rotation style of hatched line

string.name: scaleType
string.tiptext: Type of scale to be applied to the stroke

string.name: shapeFill
string.tiptext: Fill object that represents the fill settings of the stroke

string.name: space
string.tiptext: Length of spaces between hatches of a hatched line

string.name: strokeHinting
string.tiptext: Specifies whether stroke hinting is set on the stroke

string.name: style
string.tiptext: Stroke style setting

string.name: thickness
string.tiptext: Width of Stroke

string.name: variation
string.tiptext: Variation style of stippled line

string.name: waveHeight
string.tiptext: Wave style of ragged line

string.name: waveLength
string.tiptext: Wave length of ragged line

folder.name: SymbolInstance

string.name: cacheAsBitmap
string.tiptext: Specifies whether runtime bitmap caching is enabled

string.name: colorAlphaAmount

string.tiptext: Reduces or increases tint and alpha values by percentage

string.tiptext: Reduces or increases the blue tint by specified value

string.tiptext: Reduces or increases the blue tint by specified percentage

string.tiptext: Reduces or increases the green tint by specified value

string.name: colorMode

string.name: colorRedAmount
string.tiptext: Reduces or increases the red tint by specified value

string.name: colorRedPercent

string.name: description
string.tiptext: Description of the object, used by screen reader

string.tiptext: Specifies which frame of a graphic symbol to display first

string.tiptext: If true, the children of the object are not accessible to screen reader

string.name: loop
string.tiptext: Specifies the loop setting for a graphic symbol

string.tiptext: An object's shortcut key

string.tiptext: If true, object is not read by screen reader

string.name: symbolType

string.name: tabIndex
string.tiptext: tabIndex value of an object

string.tiptext: Name of the symbol in source file

string.name: symbolType

folder.name: Text
folder.tiptext: Subclass of Element; a text field on the Stage

string.name: getTextAttr
string.tiptext: Returns the specified text attribute

string.name: getTextString
string.tiptext: Returns the text string contained in the specified range

string.name: setTextAttr
string.tiptext: Sets the specified text attribute

string.name: setTextString
string.tiptext: Sets the text string within the text object

string.name: accName
string.tiptext: Name of an object, used by screen reader

string.name: antiAliasSharpness
string.tiptext: Anti-aliasing sharpness of the text

string.name: antiAliasThickness
string.tiptext: Anti-aliasing thickness of the text

string.name: autoExpand
string.tiptext: If true, the bounding width expands to display all text

string.name: border
string.tiptext: If true, displays a border around dynamic or input text

string.name: description
string.tiptext: Description of the object, used by screen reader

string.name: embeddedCharacters
string.tiptext: Embeds all specified characters

string.name: embedRanges
string.tiptext: Specifies ranges of characters to embed

string.name: fontRenderingMode
string.tiptext: Rendering mode for the text

string.name: length
string.tiptext: The number of characters in a text object

string.name: lineType
string.tiptext: The type of text line

string.name: maxCharacters
string.tiptext: Specifies the maximum characters

string.name: orientation
string.tiptext: Specifies the orientation of the text

string.name: renderAsHTML
string.tiptext: If true, text renders as HTML

string.name: scrollable
string.tiptext: If true, text can be scrolled

string.name: selectable
string.tiptext: If true, text can be selected

string.name: selectionEnd
string.tiptext: Offset of the end of a text subselection

string.name: selectionStart
string.tiptext: Offset of the beginning of a text subselection

string.name: shortcut
string.tiptext: An object's shortcut key

string.name: silent
string.tiptext: If true, object is not read by screen reader

string.name: tabIndex
string.tiptext: tabIndex value of an object

string.name: textRuns
string.tiptext: An array of TextRun objects

string.name: textType
string.tiptext: The type of text field

string.name: useDeviceFonts
string.tiptext: If true, renders text using device font

string.name: variableName
string.tiptext: Stores the contents of text field in a variable name

folder.name: TextAttrs
folder.tiptext: Subclass of TextRun; contains properties applicable to a subselection

string.name: aliasText
string.tiptext: If true, text renders aliased

string.name: alignment
string.tiptext: Paragraph justification

string.name: autoKern
string.tiptext: If true, pair kerning is used

string.name: bold
string.tiptext: If true, text is displayed as bold

string.name: characterPosition
string.tiptext: The vertical position of text

string.name: face
string.tiptext: The name of the font

string.name: fillColor
string.tiptext: A hexadecimal color string

string.name: indent
string.tiptext: Paragraph indentation

string.name: italic
string.tiptext: If true, text is displayed in italics

string.name: leftMargin
string.tiptext: A paragraph's left margin

string.name: letterSpacing
string.tiptext: Integer representing the space between characters

string.name: lineSpacing
string.tiptext: A paragraph's line spacing

string.name: rightMargin
string.tiptext: A paragraph's right margin

string.name: rotation
string.tiptext: If true, characters are rotated 90 degrees

string.name: size
string.tiptext: The size of the font

string.name: target
string.tiptext: The string for the target

string.name: url
string.tiptext: A string representing an URL

folder.name: TextRun
folder.tiptext: Subclass of Text; a string of characters

string.name: characters
string.tiptext: The text contained in a TextRun object

string.name: textAttrs
string.tiptext: TextAttrs object containing the attributes of a run of text

string.name: addMotionGuide
string.tiptext: Adds a motion guide layer

string.name: addNewLayer
string.tiptext: Adds a new layer

string.name: clearFrames
string.tiptext: Deletes all the contents from within a frame

string.name: clearKeyframes
string.tiptext: Converts keyframe to a regular frame and deletes its contents

string.name: convertToBlankKeyframes
string.tiptext: Converts specified frame to a blank keyframe

string.name: convertToKeyframes
string.tiptext: Converts specified frames to keyframes

string.name: copyFrames
string.tiptext: Copies specified frames to the clipboard

string.name: copyMotion
string.tiptext: Copies motion on selected frames, either from a motion tween or from frame by frame animation

string.name: copyMotionAsAS3
string.tiptext: Copies motion on selected frames as ActionScript 3.0 code, either from a motion tween or from frame by frame animation

string.name: createMotionTween
string.tiptext: Creates a motion tween, converts frame's contents into a symbol if it isn't one

string.name: cutFrames
string.tiptext: Cuts specified frames to the clipboard

string.name: deleteLayer
string.tiptext: Deletes layer in timeline

string.name: expandFolder
string.tiptext: If true, expands layer folder; if false, collapses it

string.name: findLayerIndex
string.tiptext: Returns an array of indices for Layers with specified name

string.name: getFrameProperty
string.tiptext: Returns the specified Frame property

string.name: getLayerProperty
string.tiptext: Returns the specified Layer property

string.name: getSelectedFrames
string.tiptext: Returns an array containing the indices of the selected Frames

string.name: getSelectedLayers
string.tiptext: Returns an array containing the indices of the selected Layers

string.name: insertBlankKeyframe
string.tiptext: Inserts a blank keyframe

string.name: insertFrames
string.tiptext: Inserts specified number of frames

string.name: insertKeyframe
string.tiptext: Inserts a keyframe

string.name: pasteFrames
string.tiptext: Pastes frames from the clipboard into a range of frames

string.name: pasteMotion
string.tiptext: Pastes the range of motion frames retrieved by timeline.copyMotion() to the Timeline

string.name: removeFrames
string.tiptext: Deletes the frame

string.name: reorderLayer
string.tiptext: Moves the specified layer

string.name: reverseFrames
string.tiptext: Reverses a range of frames

string.name: selectAllFrames
string.tiptext: Selects all the frames in the current timeline

string.name: setFrameProperty
string.tiptext: Sets the specified frame property

string.name: setLayerProperty
string.tiptext: Sets the specified layer property

string.name: setSelectedFrames
string.tiptext: Selects specified frames in the current layer

string.name: setSelectedFrames
string.tiptext: Selects the frames specified in the selection array

string.name: setSelectedLayers
string.tiptext: Selects specified layers and all the frames in those layers

string.name: showLayerMasking
string.tiptext: If true, displays layer masking

string.name: currentFrame
string.tiptext: Frame index for the location of playhead

string.name: currentLayer
string.tiptext: The currently active layer

string.name: frameCount
string.tiptext: Number of frames in the longest layer in specified timeline

string.name: layerCount
string.tiptext: The number of layers in specified Timeline

string.name: layers
string.tiptext: An array of Layer objects

string.name: name
string.tiptext: Name of the Timeline; same as Scene name

string.name: enablePIControl
string.tiptext: Enables or disables a control in the PI

string.name: setIcon
string.tiptext: Specifies PNG file to use as tool icon

string.name: setMenuString
string.tiptext: Sets the string for pop menu of tool

string.name: setOptionsFile
string.tiptext: Sets the options file for a tool

string.name: setPI
string.tiptext: Sets which PI to use with a tool

string.name: setToolName
string.tiptext: Sets the name of the tool

string.name: setToolTip
string.tiptext: Sets the tooltip for the tool

string.name: showPIControl
string.tiptext: Shows or hides specified control in the PI

string.name: showTransformHandles
string.tiptext: If true, free transform handles are displayed when tool is active

string.name: depth
string.tiptext: Location of the tool in popup menu

string.name: iconID
string.tiptext: Resource ID of the tool

string.name: position
string.tiptext: Location of the tool in Tools panel

folder.name: Tools
folder.tiptext: Records input from keyboard and mouse

string.name: constrainPoint
string.tiptext: Allows Tools movements to be constrained

string.name: getKeyDown
string.tiptext: Returns the last key pressed

string.name: setCursor
string.tiptext: Sets which cursor the tool uses

string.name: snapPoint
string.tiptext: If a snap setting is on, returns the point which snaps

string.name: activeTool
string.tiptext: Returns the ToolObj object for the currently active tool

string.name: altIsDown
string.tiptext: If TRUE, alt key is pressed

string.name: ctlIsDown
string.tiptext: If TRUE, control key is down

string.name: mouseIsDown
string.tiptext: If TRUE, left mouse button is pressed

string.name: penDownLoc
string.tiptext: The position of the last mouse down event

string.name: penLoc
string.tiptext: The current location of the mouse

string.name: shiftIsDown
string.tiptext: If TRUE, shift key is pressed

string.name: toolObjs
string.tiptext: An array of ToolObj objects

folder.name: Vertex
folder.tiptext: Contains the coordinate data of a shape

string.name: getHalfEdge
string.tiptext: Returns the HalfEdge that shares a vertex

string.name: setLocation
string.tiptext: Sets the location of a vertex

string.name: x
string.tiptext: The x location of the vertex

string.name: y
string.tiptext: The y location of the vertex

folder.name: VideoItem
folder.tiptext: Subclass of Item; a video in the Library

string.name: sourceFilePath
string.tiptext: Path to the video item

string.name: videoType
string.tiptext: Type of video the item represents

string.name: accept
string.tiptext: Exits XMLUI dialog with an accept state

string.name: cancel
string.tiptext: Exits XMLUI dialog with a cancel state

string.name: get
string.tiptext: Returns specified property's value in the XMLUI dialog box

string.name: getControlItemElement
string.tiptext: Returns label and value of selected line

string.name: getEnabled
string.tiptext: If true, the control is enabled

string.name: getVisible
string.tiptext: If true, the control is visible

string.name: set
string.tiptext: Sets specified property's value in the XMLUI dialog box

string.name: setControlItemElement
string.tiptext: Sets the label and value of selected line

string.name: setControlItemElements
string.tiptext: Sets the label and value of all lines in the control

string.name: setEnabled
string.tiptext: Enables or disables (dims) a control

string.name: setVisible
string.tiptext: Shows or hides a control

folder.name: Deprecated
folder.tiptext: Features that should be avoided in new content

string.name: characterSpacing
string.tiptext: Integer representing the space between characters
